posts.title: Feb 1
posts.content:
I’m a computer programmer designing products…

  • My friends at 2389 are helping me become a computer programmer. I’m coding skills and products.
  • My recent focus has been on how AI can help us design the UI of products. I’ve played around with Anthropic’s /frontend-design tool and even tried to improve it (link to landing page design tool).
  • Guiding design principles - how can we make this more autonomous? How can we make it so that we’re not at a computer screen?
  • I’m thinking through what the future of a user interface looks like - how do we interact with AI in a
  • I’ve been coding on the go with Blink and tmux.
  • I’m exploring what idea validation looks like in the age where everything is reproducible, meaning nothing is defensible.

I’m studying global adoption of AI…

  • I’ve been reading a lot about how different countries are relying on and engaging with AI products, shoutout Anthropic for their data.
  • I recently studied Japan’s relationship with robots, all of which Cham wrote about here [hyperlink]
  • Studying how

The Normal

  • I’ve been coping with the Chicago cold by consuming as much soup as possible.
  • Come hang out at our office!
